Returns: A Cursor containing all attendees for the event
Parameters: ContentResolver: The content resolver to use for the query
long: The id of the event to retrieve attendees for
String: the columns to return in the cursor
query(android.content.ContentResolver,lo.Description: Queries all attendees associated with the given event. This is a blocking call and should not be done on the UI thread.
query(android.content.ContentResolver,lo.FullName: public static Cursor query (ContentResolver cr, long eventId, String[] projection)

ClassDesc: Fields and helpers for interacting with Attendees. Each row of this table represents a single attendee or guest of an event. Calling @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#Attendees#query_E@ will return a list of attendees for the event with the given eventId. Both apps and sync adapters may write to this table. There are six writable fields and all of them except @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#AttendeesColumns#ATTENDEE_NAME_E@ must be included when inserting a new attendee. They are: @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#AttendeesColumns#EVENT_ID_E@ @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#AttendeesColumns#ATTENDEE_NAME_E@ @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#AttendeesColumns#ATTENDEE_EMAIL_E@ @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#AttendeesColumns#ATTENDEE_RELATIONSHIP_E@ @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#AttendeesColumns#ATTENDEE_TYPE_E@ @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#AttendeesColumns#ATTENDEE_STATUS_E@ @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#AttendeesColumns#ATTENDEE_IDENTITY_E@ @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#AttendeesColumns#ATTENDEE_ID_NAMESPACE_E@
